title: Distributed Allocation
description: Distributed allocation spreads systems and applications over multiple equipment pools or data centers in order to improve resiliency.
key-ideas: Resources and equipment concentrated in an isolated geograhpic area or single data center is susceptible to total service disruption.
Resources can be distributed by the creation of multiple data centers, spreading applications across multiple servers, or by provisioning resources in multiple cloud regions.
Distributed allocation may also be used on a local scale by spreading critical applications and services over multiple devices or systems.
